alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 29 at 6:28PM AKST until December 30 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY FOR THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Northeast Prince William Sound. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northerly wind gusts to 50 mph this evening are expected to persist into the overnight hours before diminishing by early Saturday morning. In addition to the dangerously cold wind chills, expect the gusty winds to create areas of drifting and blowing snow with visibilities reduced to as low as one mile through the pass.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
